summary: A forensic psychiatrist discovers that all but one of her patient's multiple personalities are murder victims. She will have to find out what's happening before her time is finished.
cast: Julianne Moore|Jonathan Rhys Meyers|Jeffrey DeMunn|Frances Conroy|Nate Corddry|Brooklynn Proulx|Brian Anthony Wilson|Joyce Feurring|Steven Rishard|Charles Techman|John Peakes|Michael Graves|Chaz Moneypenny|Charles David Richards|Rick Applegate|Loretta Higgins|Tamara Johnson|Trenton Rupecht|Diane Jonardi|Jules Sylvester|Nick Angelou|KatiAna Davis|James Howard|Michael Mihalich|Paul J. Rosenburg|Gino Crognale|Jeremy Ambler|Giovanna Angle|Elysia Annacini|Gregory W Bartley|Aaron Bernard|Jim Brough|Casey Brown|Carl Clemons|Emily Goode|John W. director: Directors: Måns Mårlind (as Mårlind & Stein), Björn Stein (as Mårlind & Stein)
title: La sombra de los otros
